snippet: As unlimited data plans fade away, services and applications are being designed to help users manage their consumption.
abstract: Several companies are introducing mobile phone applications that help users manage and understand their data usage, as cellphone carriers replace unlimited data with more limited plans; apps point out instances of heavy data usage such as video and image sites, helping users tweak their habits to avoid extra charges.

headline.main: Apps Seek to Help Phone Users Track Data
headline.print_headline: Apps Seek To Help Phone Users Track Data

snippet: The atmosphere is informal at the Tuscan Osteria and Mercato in New Canaan, but there is nothing casual about the kitchen, where the chef, Marc Minella, turns out wonderfully creative dishes.
abstract: Patricia Brooks reviews The Tuscan Osteria and Mercato restaurant in New Canaan (Metropolitan/Connecticut).

headline.main: Amid the Informality, Inspired Italian Flavors
headline.print_headline: Amid the Informality, Inspired Italian Flavors

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Tuscan Osteria and Mercato (New Canaan, Conn Restaurant)

snippet: The popularity of beer-making, by hobbyists and entrepreneurs, has grown on Long Island in recent years.
abstract: Beer-making by hobbyists and entrepreneurs has become increasingly popular on Long Island; several shops stock beer-making kits, brewing equipment and raw ingredients (Metropolitan/Long Island).

headline.main: The Art of Making Beer: Not Just for Professionals
headline.print_headline: The Art of Making Beer: Not Just for Professionals

snippet: iRobot has sold millions of Roomba vacuum cleaners, and its bomb disposal robots protect soldiers. Now, it is using video and computing advances to create robots that can handle more duties.
abstract: iRobot, company that has had considerable success with its Roomba automated vacuum cleaners, is developing a new generation of robots that will be able to handle a wider array of tasks; company is developing a 5-foot-4 model called Ava, which utilizes video and computing advances to do office work remotely, and which may one day handle household chores.

headline.main: For iRobot, the Future Is Getting Closer
